sentences.sentence: “We cannot fix it on our own—we want to be a catalyst and a convenor, ” she says.
sentences.translation: 她说道：”仅凭我们自己的力量还远远不够，我们想做催化剂和号召者。

sentences.sentence: The convenor, knowing the pre-eminence of this individual increased the cost of attending the lectures without consulting them first.
sentences.translation: 大会的召集者知道这位显赫的学者的到来将会使参加会议的费用增加，但却没有事先咨询其他的参加者。
